channel.title: Eklipse [317]
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Eklipse[/size]
I'd like to start things off with saying this is my second ever release to the community, criticism is okay but I'd prefer it be constructive. I recently started working with Delta's for the first time a week ago and then started messing around with this source maybe two days ago, I've now grown tired of it and would like to move onto something much more stable like hyperion.
Secondly, I'd like to state the credits so there's no confusion. Delta_ Marcbob Me (Acorn_)
Now lets move onto something you'd really like to read.
Downloads ; Source - http://uppit.com/7vhcxm8j8004/Eklipse.rar Client (Credits to Marcbob) - http://uppit.com/9sqchrtzbsd0/2Speced_Client_1.0.rar (Unfortunately for me, my internet is very slow and I run off a wifi with 2 other computers an Xbox and an iPod using it as well at all times so it takes a large amount of time for me to upload a 27Mb file (Oddly enough thats a 3 Minute download though? :P ) So I'm unable to edit any clients if I'd like to so this is the origional client for the server I edited, no customs/sprites were added (besides a backround and edited CMD run/compile name ect so there should be no problems.
Few [u]Main[/u] Boss's ; King Black Dragon Toktz Jad Bandos General Chaos Ele
Combat ; The combat in the server is nearly the same as PI when it comes to Player vs. Player. When it comes to Player vs. Monster the combat system isn't perfect but its much better then many other basic Delta's.
Skills ; Skilling isn't much of a main factor in the sever as PvP but its still implented into the game with all skills working, Their not all 100% like other servers claim to have but there basic for what you need to make cash and have fun.
Customs ; A few custom items such as PvP Armour, Dragon Claws, Skillcapes, Avas Accumulator, Void, and the Armadyl Godsword are existing in the servers item database and are implented and working how there supposed to in current day Runescape but are not dropped by any monsters except for the Avas Accumulator and Void knight which can be gained through Pest Control so if you'd like to have a custom free server, its not hard to delete them from game.
Starter location & Gear ; For your starter gear, I'm not a big fan of giving players a giant boost economical wise when starting out as I'd like to make them earn it (even though its not that hard really) So there left off with 3M, a weapon for training Defence/Strength/Attack a Bow & Arrows for training Range/Defence and a Air staff with a couple of runes for training Mage/Defence. The starter location is one that has never yet before been seen by the moparscape community, its a cut off section of draynor that is in the shape of a square and is cut off from the rest of the map. (It was origionally going to be Draynor but the map was thrown out and redone for some reason by JaGex.) Theres a portal on the map that teleports you to the home location (edgeville) and sends a message when clicked telling you check the help command.
Enough talk, lets see some pictures! [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4751/3333lj.png[/img] [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/7296/87705348.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8366/unled1me.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/8593/unledhxa.png[/img]
Now that about wraps things up, For any questions or problems please feel free to comment below and I'll be glad to help you with them - and remember, constructive criticism [u]only[/u] please! For every download I'd like a comment, thank you.

item.title: Eklipse [317]
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

melt man1:

Looks great. trying it out right now, but some of the items don’t seem to be working with the client I assume, like the claws are nulled and I can’t find the AGS…

This is Delta not Project Insanity, so the codes are changed from what they would be in PI.
For example, Armadyl Godswords code in PI is something like 11694, while in Delta its 35 (replaces excaliber I believe).
You can find all custom items you want to implement into the server in the “items” file, they all have correct stats, bonuses, correctly slotted when equipped etc, they’re just not dropped or can be gained in anyway unless spawned.

Read full topic
